column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''43''' is the forty-third issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "Words of Joy": Five Catholic Prayers in Quenya — [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. Part One:
** '''The above articles are previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.'''
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
